venue.address_1: South Windsor location is at 40 Sandra Drive, Suite 7-8, South Windsor
venue.name: MELT Fitness Studio

item.description: MamaLicious Live Green Smoothie demonstration at M.E.L.T. Fitness Studio OPEN HOUSE - Thursday October 6th for their One Year Anniversary Party of their South Windsor location. The event is from 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm and M.E.L.T.'s South Windsor location is at 40 Sandra Drive, Suite 7-8, South Windsor. M.E.L.T. will be donating $5 for every new friend who comes to the event to Connecticut's Children's Hospital so bring friends! There will be: -A dunk tank to "dunk" the trainers -Food -Wine -Music -Free Chair Massages -Raffles -Free Spray on Tans And much more! M.E.L.T. (more energy, less time) specializes in 30 minute workouts for busy people looking to burn body fat and tone up. For more information on M.E.L.T., visit www.meltfitnessstudio.com.
item.name: MELT Fitness Studio - OPEN HOUSE
